Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily productivity and streamline your workflow. With its advanced features and user-friendly interface, this product has proven to be invaluable to many of our satisfied customers. Given its high quality and versatility, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you today for $200. I'm confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and time-saving capabilities. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
